summary: This document is an email forwarded by 'G. Max' to 'jeeproject@yahoo.com' containing a message from an unnamed female trainer/dancer to Ghislaine Maxwell. The trainer discusses her ongoing work with Jeffrey Epstein, her interest in continuing to train him, and proposes a financial arrangement for her to actively recruit other 'beautiful, talented young women' to work/train with Epstein.

persons.name: G. Max
persons.context: Forwards an email from an unnamed trainer to the jeeproject@yahoo.com address, with the subject line indicating he had contacted the trainer to see if she had 'seen anyone for you'.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Addressed in the forwarded email as 'hi ghislaine'. The email discusses working with Jeffrey Epstein and recruiting other women for him, indicating her central role in these activities.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as 'Jeffery' [sic] in the email. The trainer states she enjoys working with him, that he 'likes to work with a variety of beautiful, talented young women,' and discusses finding more people to train/work with him.

connections.description: The email implies Maxwell is coordinating the recruitment of young women for Epstein, acting as an intermediary between Epstein and the trainer.
G. Max is forwarding a sensitive email about recruiting women for Epstein to Maxwell (via jeeproject@yahoo.com), indicating a working relationship.
The trainer states she has been training Epstein ('we work well together') and is interested in continuing to do so, indicating a professional trainer-client relationship.
The trainer is communicating directly with Maxwell about financial arrangements for recruiting other women for Epstein, indicating a business relationship.

events.title: Trainer's email to Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: An unnamed female trainer/dancer sends an email to Ghislaine Maxwell discussing her work with Jeffrey Epstein, her enjoyment of training him, and proposing a paid role to actively recruit other 'beautiful, talented young women' to work/train with Epstein.

keyFacts: An unnamed trainer/dancer explicitly states that Jeffrey Epstein 'likes to work with a variety of beautiful, talented young women' and discusses the difficulty of finding suitable individuals.
The trainer proposes a formal financial arrangement with Ghislaine Maxwell to make 'looking for other people' her 'main source of income,' indicating a systematic recruitment effort.
The email is forwarded to 'jeeproject@yahoo.com', an email address associated with Ghislaine Maxwell, demonstrating her direct involvement in coordinating the recruitment of women for Epstein.
The trainer mentions she already has 'a couple of girls in mind,' showing active scouting was underway.

The correspondence treats the recruitment of young women for Epstein as a business transaction, with the trainer concerned about being paid for her time spent looking and for effectively 'doing myself out of a job' by finding replacements.
